RLS policies created for all tables

acceptance_criteria: Test user can sign up and appears in Supabase

tasks.name: User Profile & Preferences
tasks.notes: Completed: User profile page, preferences API routes, timezone handling, work hours config. Built with design system standards.

tasks.name: Goal Management (CRUD)
tasks.notes: Completed: Full CRUD API routes for goals and milestones, comprehensive UI with stats dashboard, goal hierarchy support, milestone management. Build passes successfully.

tasks.name: Task Management (CRUD)
tasks.notes: Completed: Full CRUD API routes for tasks with filtering, subtask support, completion tracking with duration/energy logging, procrastination detection. Comprehensive UI with tabs, filters, expand/collapse subtasks, Eisenhower quadrant badges. Build passes successfully.

tasks.name: AI Integration Setup (Vercel AI SDK)
acceptance_criteria: Vercel AI SDK installed and configured
Test API route returns AI response
tasks.notes: Completed: AI configuration with Sonnet & Haiku models, comprehensive prompt templates (onboarding, task generation, categorization, reflection, etc.), cost tracking system with usage logging, test API route with error handling. Build passes successfully.

tasks.name: Onboarding AI Interview
tasks.notes: Completed: Full conversational AI interview with Quick Start mode (5 questions), SMART goal validation, progressive profiling, goal creation with milestones, initial task generation, and automatic redirect to dashboard. Build passes successfully.

tasks.name: Daily Task Generation AI
tasks.notes: Completed: API route for task generation, helper to gather user context, UI component with accept/modify/edit functionality, integrated into tasks page. Build passes successfully.

tasks.name: Backlog Management
tasks.notes: Completed: Full backlog CRUD API routes, comprehensive UI with filters and views (all/suggested/stale), AI prioritization with Sonnet, promote to task functionality. Build passes successfully.

tasks.name: Morning Planning Session
tasks.notes: Completed: Morning planning dialog with auto-trigger, AI task generation integration, plan confirmation tracking. Database migration file created for tracking. Build passes successfully.

tasks.name: Evening Reflection
tasks.notes: Completed: Evening reflection dialog with auto-trigger (after 6 PM), reflection form (what went well, what blocked, energy level, mood), AI analysis with Sonnet generating insights and suggestions, completion stats display. API routes for saving reflections and AI analysis. Build compiles successfully.

tasks.name: Weekly Summary Generation
tasks.notes: Completed: Weekly summary generation with AI analysis. Created helper functions for weekly stats calculation, API routes for generating and fetching summaries, UI component with tabs for overview/wins/challenges/next-week, integrated into Analytics page. Features: completion rates, time invested, energy data, goal progress, patterns detection, AI insights (key wins, challenges, suggestions), goals needing attention, backlog suggestions. Build passes successfully.

tasks.name: Progress Tracking & Analytics Dashboard
tasks.notes: Completed: Comprehensive analytics dashboard with goal progress tracking (completion %, velocity, trend indicators, projected dates, milestones), task analytics (completion metrics for today/week/month, time metrics by goal/type, estimation accuracy), and pattern recognition (productive days/times, task speed analysis, procrastination patterns, energy correlation). Created analytics helper functions, API routes, and UI components with tabs. Build compiles successfully.

tasks.name: Calendar View
tasks.notes: Completed: Full calendar view implementation with Day/Week/Month views, time blocks management, API routes for scheduling and conflict detection, calendar helper functions, and toast notifications. Build passes successfully.

tasks.name: Main Dashboard
tasks.notes: Completed: Comprehensive main dashboard with today's tasks widget (task completion tracking, quick complete actions), goal progress cards (progress bars, milestones, deadlines, attention alerts), quick actions (7 action buttons for navigation), energy indicator (current/average energy, peak time, contextual tips), upcoming tasks widget (next 7 days, urgency alerts), streak stats (current/longest streak), responsive layout. Created API route for dashboard summary data, all dashboard components built. Build compiles successfully.

tasks.name: AI Chat Interface
tasks.notes: Completed: AI chat interface with streaming responses, chat UI component with message history, API route for chat that gathers user context (goals, tasks, completion rate, energy patterns, reflections), conversational AI coach functionality. Build passes successfully.

tasks.name: Energy Tracking System
tasks.notes: Completed: Energy tracking system with API routes for logging and pattern analysis, energy helper functions, UI components (EnergyLogEntry, EnergyHeatmap, EnergyCreatorsDrainers), dedicated energy tracking page with tabs for logging, patterns, and creators/drainers analysis. Added to navigation sidebar. Build passes successfully.

tasks.name: Settings Page
tasks.notes: Completed: Enhanced settings page with theme toggle (light/dark/system modes using next-themes), data export functionality (exports all user data as JSON including goals, tasks, reflections, energy logs, backlog, weekly summaries, and AI usage), account deletion with confirmation (requires typing 'DELETE', deletes all user data from Supabase and Clerk). Created API routes /api/user/export and /api/user/delete. Build passes successfully.
